attributes.action: Scrap the £2.50 flat rate fee for the credit card payment method
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The DVLA are charging £2.50 for all credit card transactions for tax disc purchases.

This targets the poor and is also profiting from credit card charges which are in reality much lower for individual transactions.

Please scrap this charge as well as any other charges for credit card transactions.
